org.apache.gearpump.streaming.dsl.window.api

Class Windows<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.gearpump.streaming.dsl.window.api.Windows<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, scala.Equals, scala.Product

    public class Windows<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements scala.Product, scala.Serializable
    Defines how to apply window functions.

    param: windowFn how to divide windows param: trigger when to trigger window result param: accumulationMode whether to accumulate results across windows

    See Also:
